0 Likes • 12/4/2023

10th December is the ordinary election of the District Council of Hong Kong. The next day, which is the 11th of December is a special holiday.

Voting, and elections, might be far away from students. Moreover, it isn't a mediocre thing that happens in places like Hong Kong. Regardless, citizens aged over 18 years old have the responsibility to participate in the election of the District Council of Hong Kong. Teachers will participate in the election as well; they will vote, using their time.

For the sake of compensating the precious time to teachers, the next day, which is the 11th of December, is a school holiday. Which is marked as a special holiday in the school calendar.
